CustomField.description: Shipto that will candidates for the Contact to receive an email.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Enter a Shipto number that you want to be a candidate for the Contact to receive an email.
Note: If ALL Shiptos for the Account should be candidates for the Contact to receive an email, then ALL of the Shipto entries need to be cleared.
CustomField.label: CERT Shipto 3
